name: Blind Room
description:
Welcome to the "Blind Room".  All twelve people you called showed up. Now's your chance to find the fearless murderer. But you'll need to use your magic dice. When someone rolls them, they roll a specific number. The higher the number on the die is, the more nervous or scared that person is. Can you use this to your advantage and solve this mystery?

Shortcuts:

  • H - Help
  • N - Notes
  • T - Tips
  • R - Roll
